name: Imposter Evolution: REVOLVED
description:
Welcome to Imposter Evolution: REVOLVED

Help the Imposters take over the universe in this pixel-art idle evolution game from the creator of Hellhole Island. Discover 15 Imposters (more coming in future updates) and find out more about them. Based off my old Unity game from 2021 (it sure is old as of im writing this its not even a year since i made it haha)

Features

  • A minimal, pixel-art graphical style
  • Satisfying gameplay
  • Upgrade system
  • Imposters

In-game music by voron_momento, check him out: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy__lyPKfZC2zGV1K1Vi2OQ
